subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A one-out single in the ninth by the Twins’ Joe Mauer was the only hit allowed by the Tigers’ Anibal Sanchez, who fell short of his second career no-hitter.
snippet: A one-out single in the ninth by the Twins’ Joe Mauer was the only hit allowed by the Tigers’ Anibal Sanchez, who fell short of his second career no-hitter.
